name: Mice Heist
description:
Become a brave mouse a take the humans for all their worth while only the cat is in the house!

---------------------------------------------

For two weeks in December 2021 on the Erindale.XYZ Discord server, we had a little game jam to build something collectively.

As a server of mainly artists, the onus fell upon the few developers to actually handle bringing things into engine so huge props to them for managing that.
